title: Willow Tree (Farming)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Willow trees can be grown by members with level 30 Farming. Players may plant a willow seed into a plant pot with a gardening trowel to get a willow seedling, after using a watering can to water the seedling, players will have to wait until it grows into an willow sapling (seedlings can still grow if banked).

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Willow Tree (Farming)
This article is about the Farming trees. For the Woodcutting trees, see Willow. For the player-owned house trees, see Willow tree (Construction).

Willow trees can be grown by members with level 30 Farming. Players may plant a willow seed into a plant pot with a gardening trowel to get a willow seedling, after using a watering can to water the seedling, players will have to wait until it grows into an willow sapling (seedlings can still grow if banked).

Willow saplings can then be planted in a tree patch, granting 25 experience, a further 1456.3 experience upon reaching full growth. A payment of a full basket of apples can be paid to a nearby Gardener to watch over willow trees. If buying the willow seed and apples on the Grand Exchange, it will cost around 1,306 per tree, assuming one pays a gardener.

Seeds per 1

Growth time 280 min (7x40 min = 4 hours and 40 minutes)
Regrow Yes

Sapling Willow sapling
Plant Willow Tree
Crop Willow logs, Willow roots
Experience
Planting XP 25 xp
Checking XP 1,456.5 xp
Harvesting XP No
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Willow logs1Always[d 1]3224
Leaves (willow)1Always[d 2][d 3]Not sold0
Willow roots1–4Always[d 4]18–720
Willow branch1–6Always[d 5][d 1]905–5,4301–6
  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 Only dropped by Grown version.
  2. ↑ Requires pruning with secateurs to cure disease.
  3. ↑ Only dropped by Diseased version.
  4. ↑ Only dropped by Stump version.
  5. ↑ Requires pruning with secateurs to obtain the branches. Branches refresh every 5 minutes to a max of 6.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 April 2013
(update)

Farming gardeners will more reliably recognise that fully-grown willow trees can be chopped down.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.

'''Willow trees''' can be grown by [[members]] with level 30 [[Farming]]. Players may plant a [[willow seed]] into a [[plant pot]] with a [[gardening trowel]] to get a [[willow seedling]], after using a [[watering can]] to water the seedling, players will have to wait until it grows into an [[willow sapling]] (seedlings can still grow if banked).

Willow saplings can then be planted in a [[tree patch]], granting 25 experience, a further 1456.3 experience upon reaching full growth. A payment of a [[Apples#(5)|full basket of apples]] can be paid to a nearby [[Group of Advanced Gardeners|Gardener]] to watch over willow trees. If buying the [[willow seed]] and apples on the [[Grand Exchange]], it will cost around {{Coins|{{GEP|Willow seed}}+{{GEP|Apples(5)}}}} per tree, assuming one pays a gardener.
